task_description:
# Rate Limiting Implementation

Implement API rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure service stability. Include configurable limits per endpoint category with graceful degradation and informative error responses.

## Rationale
Critical for production security and stability. Currently identified as technical debt. Prevents DoS attacks and ensures fair resource usage across concurrent users.

## User Stories
- As a system administrator, I want rate limiting in place so that the service remains stable during high load periods
- As a security engineer, I want API rate limits so that the platform is protected from abuse

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Rate limits configurable via environment variables or config file
- [ ] Returns 429 Too Many Requests with Retry-After header when limit exceeded
- [ ] Different rate limits for different endpoint categories (auth, execution, read)
- [ ] Rate limit metrics exposed in health endpoint
- [ ] Graceful handling that doesn't crash the application
